QuestData.Title: Seek Out Karuk!
QuestData.Description: A fellow survivor of Pal'ea known as Karuk has made his way to the main base of the Kvaldir in the Borean Tundra - far to the south where the snow was once bountiful. Karuk hides along the bluffs overlooking Riplash Strand.$B$BSeek out Karuk and let him know what you did for my people here at the Coast of Echoes.$B$BThe safest route to Karuk is through your fortress. From Warsong Hold, take the road south and follow it around until you reach Riplash Strand.
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out Karuk at Riplash Strand.
QuestData.RewardText: Waltor was wise in sending you to me, $r. The gods smile down upon those that mete justice. You will be $g he:she; that doles out punishment to the wicked!
